claim_summary: The claim requires further review due to inconsistencies in patient names and missing details in the insurance policy.

validation_checks.details: Patient name on pre-auth form (Mrs. Bhavanath Kumar) does not match identification document (Bhavath Kumar).
Policy number on pre-auth form (2-91-25-00001962-000) does not match insurance policy (2.81-25.000.162.000).
DOB of insured is missing in the insurance policy, which is critical for validation.
Contact number on pre-auth form matches the declaration.

final_recommendation: Further investigation is needed to resolve discrepancies in patient identification and policy details.
